resources.string: Initially, lie down on your back and bend your legs. Take the support of your hands on the side, lift your head and touch your heels alternatively with your hands.
Lie down on the ground. Raise your hands slowly and touch to your knees. Now, low backdown yourself slowly.Repeat it
Lie down on your back and bend your legs. Place your right hand behind your head and left hand behind your left knee. Now raise your body and then return back to the initial position. Repeat it.
Lie down on your back and bend your legs. Place your left hand behind your head and right hand behind your right knee. Now raise your body and then return back to the initial position. Repeat it.

Initially, stand with your feet and shoulder wide. Stretch your arms in front of your body at shoulder level and let the arms overlap each other in the shape of letter X. Now spread the arms. Switch the arms and repeat it.
Initially be in a push-up position with your feet, 12 inches apart. Lower your body till your upper arms are parallel to the ground and then raise your body to the initial position. Repeat it.
Lie down on the ground. Raise your shoulder from ground and stay in that position for few seconds. Now, low backdown yourself slowly.
Place your hands on the edge of the bench.Now,slowly lower your body by bending your elbows.Slowly push yourself back up to starting position.Repeat it
Stand with your feet, few inches apart. Raise your right knee towards your left elbow. Return back to the initial position. Repeat the same on the other side.
Initially be in a push-up position. Elevate your legs on a bench. Now move your body up and down. Repeat it.
Be on your toes and hands by raising your body. Keep your hands in a diamond shape. Now lower your body and then raise your body. Repeat it

Initially, stand with your feet and shoulder wide. Now place both your hands on your waist with fingers downwards and elbows outwards. Slowly pull both your elbows backwards and then bring them back to the initial position. Repeat it.

Start by lying on your back. Keep your arms on the side and lift your legs. Let the legs be as straight as possible. Now, quickly raise your right leg and at the same time, lower your left leg. Then do the same on the other leg. Repeat it.
Stand with your feet, few inches apart. Raise your right knee towards your left elbow. Return back to the initial position. Repeat the same on the other side.
Start in a normal push-up position, with your hands raised on a bench. Then push your body up and down using your arms. Repeat it.

Initially, stand by keeping your feet, few inches wide. Now,just jump and extend your arms overhead with that slightly bend your knees and extend your legs.Now come back to the starting position Repeat this.
Be in a normal push-up position. Let your knees touch the ground and raise your feet above the ground. Now raise your body up and then bring it down. Repeat it.
Lie down on the ground. Raise your legs slowly untill your feet are pointed 90Â°. Now,slowly lower your legs.Repeat it
Lie down on the ground. Raise your legs slowly and bring your knee as close to your chest.Repeat it

Start by standing, with your feet few iches apart. Keep your hands on the hip. Stretch your right leg and bring your body down, till your right thigh is parallel to the floor. Come back to the initial position and repeat the same on the left leg.
Be on your toes and forearms with your body straight. Stay in this position for as long as possible.
Start in a plank position. Alternatively extend each of your arms forward. Let your body be straight. Repeat it.
Initially be in the plank position. Touch the left shoulder using your right hand and return to the initial position. Do the same on the other side. Repeat it.

Be on your toes and forearms with your body straight. Raise your left leg for few seconds as it is possible.Now,lower your left leg and raise your right leg.Now come back to initial position.Repeat this.
Initially, stand with your feet and shoulder wide, knees slightly bent. Now bend your elbows and punch forward with your fists, alternatively with both arms. Repeat it.
Be in a normal push-up position. Bring your body down until it is 1 to 2 inches above the ground. Be in this position for sometime and breathe normally.
Initially, face-down prone position on the floor. Stretch your arms and touch the floor.Raise yourself by pushing the ground away from you.Repeat this.

Stand with your feet, few inches wide. keep your hands near your ears with elbows to the side. Bring both your elbows to the centre of your body and then return back to the initial position. Repeat it.
Initially be in a standing position.Then jump as if you have a skipping rope in your hand. Repeat it.
Stand with your legs a few inches apart. Stretch your arms to the front and bring the body down, till your thighs are parallel to the floor. Now come back to the initial position. Repeat it.
Stand with your left arm near a wall. Now extend your left arm and touch the wall. Slightly turn your body towards the right.
Stand with your right arm near a wall. Now extend your right arm and touch the wall. Slightly turn your body towards the left.
Sit on a chair. Hold the chair and move your hip off the chair. Now move your body up and down by taking the support of your arms. Repeat it.
Lift your left arm, bend it and place it on your back. Hold the left elbow using your right hand and pull it. Be in this position for some seconds.
Lift your right arm, bend it and place it on your back. Hold the right elbow using your left hand and pull it. Be in this position for some seconds.
Lie down on the ground. Raise both your legs with keeping hands side about 45 degrees off the ground. Now, low backdown yourself slowly.
Lie down on the ground. Lift your head slowly towards your knees and Try to touch your hands to your toes.Now, low backdown yourself slowly.
Initially, stand a inch or two, away from the wall. Stretch your arms and touch the wall. Lean and push against the wall, with your arms and then come back. Repeat this.
Initially, kneel on the ground. Lower and raise your body using your arms. Let the arms be wide on the ground. Repeat it.
Sit on your butt, your back is up and hold dumbbell in one of your hand. Now bend the knee of opposite leg and pass the dumbbell to other hand and straight the leg. Do same with other hand.

Lie down on ground and bend your knees.Hold dumbbells in each hand. Now push your back upwards and push your left hand upwards.Now take back your hands and come to normal position and do the same with right hand.

Lie down on ground and bend your knees. Hold a dumbbell according to your strength.Now push your back upwards and straight your hands in upwards direction.Now first take your hands in same position then your back.

Sit on the floor on your butt.Flod your legs and put your heels on ground.Now hold a dumbbell or any weight according to your strength and push that dumbbell toward ground in left or right direction by opening your legs straight nd push your back towards ground.

Sit on the floor on your butt.Raise your legs and slightly bend the knee then lower your back towards ground making shape like english alphabet V Now hold a dumbbell or any weight according to your strength and push that dumbbell toward ground in left or right direction.
Stand in straight position and hold one dumbbell in left hand.Now bend down your back towards ground in your left direction as much as possible then come back to normal position.
Stand in straight position and hold one dumbbell in right hand.Now bend down your back towards ground in your right direction as much as possible then come back to normal position.

Lie on ground with your left hand up and hold a dumbbell in that hand and put your right hand on the ground. Put your right leg straight and bend your left leg.Now raise your shoulder and leg like that you should touch your toe with dumbbell. Then come back to normal position.

Lie on ground with your right hand up and hold a dumbbell in that hand and put your left hand on the ground. Put your left leg straight and bend your right leg.Now raise your shoulder and leg like that you should touch your toe with dumbbell. Then come back to normal position.
Lie on ground with your hands extending over your head and hold a dumbbell in your hand.Now bend your knees and lift your back like that dumbbell should touch your knees.Go back to main position.

Lie down on ground and put your hands behind. Now pull your left leg, right hand and back like that you should touch your toe with your hand and in this hand and leg should straight as much as possible then slowly come back in same position after do same with right leg and left hand.

First lie down on the floor, face down with your feet close together. Place your arms straight out, shoulder width apart, tight your abs and hold your body in a plank position. While maintaining a straight body, lower yourself down until your chest is an inch above the floor and elbows pullingback roughly at 45 degrees. Bring your knees in towards your elbows, feeling the contraction in your abdominals. Slowly extend your feet back into the starting position and keep your arms straight. Repeat this.

The most accurate way to measure your Blood Alcohol Concentration (BAC) or alcohol level is to use a breathalyzer, but sometimes one is not readily available. In cases like this, use the charts below to plan for how many drinks you should limit yourself to.\n\nMultiply your weight in kg by 2.2 to get your weight in lbs using the calculator above.

Lie down on your back, with your arms stretched to the side. Raise your legs and bend your knees at 90 degree angle. Now twist your knees to the left. Stay in this position for 1-2 minutes. Return to the initial position and do the same on the right side.
Lie down by keeping your hand, on the back of your head. Lift your right knee and stretch your left elbow towards it. Repeat the same for the other side.
You should be in good health and atleast 17 years old with a body weight of 50 kg or 110 pounds.
Calculate your next eligible donation date
Level of alcohol content in blood
Volume of blood of any individual
To find your BMI, locate where your height and weight intersect; your BMI is listed in the square
Shows whether people have the right weight for their height
A measure of fitness level of an individual
Calculate the number of breaths you have taken so far (i.e.,since your birth).
Estimated Calorie Needs per Day, by Age, Sex, and Physical Activity Level
Calculate your daily calorie requirements for weight gain/loss

â£ Male donors could be eligible to give blood at a maximum frequency of every 12 weeks (4 times per year) but normally less often.

â£ Female donors could be eligible to give blood at a maximum frequency of every 16 weeks (3 times per year) but normally less often.

â£ Women between the ages of 17 and 19 who weigh less than 10 stone 3lbs (65kg) and whose height is below 5 feet 6 inches (168cm) need to have their blood volume estimated before giving blood. Please see the chart below. If your blood volume is within the shaded area you will be unable to donate until after your 20th birthday.
Sit on your knees, with your toes, few inches apart. Lift both your hands and lower your body by exhaling. Be in this pose. Return back, by raising your body and inhaling.

First lie down on the floor, face down with your feet close together. Place your arms straight out, shoulder width apart, tight your abs and hold your body in a plank position. While maintaining a straight body, lower yourself down until your chest is an inch above the floor and elbows pullingback roughly at 45 degrees.Explosively push yourself up, extending your elbows. While your hands are off the ground, clap them together. Return your hands to the ground just outside shoulder-width. Lower yourself back to the starting position. Repeat this.
Lie down on the ground. Raise your upper body and bend your knees. Now, clap under the knees, by lifting the legs alternatively.
Lie down with your head facing the ground. Keep your hands at the side of your shoulders. Now, raise your chest with your arms. Be in this position for some time.
Lie down by bending your knees. Keep your arms crossed on your chest. Raise your upper body and return to the initial position. Repeat it.
Take position of plank.Now bring one knee and opposite elbow like that they should touch each other.then come back in plank position.Do the same with other leg.
Lie down on ground and lift your both legs upwards(ninety degree from ground).Now lift your back up till you feel contraction in your abs then slowly come back in same position.
Take 2 â 3 glasses of water additionally if you exercise or if your environmental conditions are hot.

First lie down on the floor, face down with your feet close together. Place your arms straight out, shoulder width apart, tight your abs and hold your body in a plank position. While maintaining a straight body, lower yourself down until your chest is an inch above the floor and elbows pullingback roughly at 45 degrees. Now push yourself using your both knees and hands. Repeat this.
The due date calculation is based on the average 28-day cycle.

First lie down on the floor, face down with your feet close together. Place your hands on an elevated surfaceâsuch as bench. Place your arms straight out, shoulder width apart, tight your abs and hold your body in a plank position. While maintaining a straight body, lower yourself down until your chest is an inch above the floor and elbows pulling back roughly at 45 degrees. Donât let your hips sag at any point. Now push your torso away fom ground until your arms are straight. Repeat this.
Choose the date of last donation
You must be over 153 cm to calculate ideal weight
You must be over 5 feet to calculate ideal weight
Choose the 1st day of your last menstrual period
As you can see below, you have the body fat percentage chart for women and now men (below) that you need to input the numbers from your measurements using calipers.

First lie down on the floor, face down with your feet close together. Place your hands about approximately 36 inches apart from each other. Place your toes on top of a flat bench. This will allow your body to be elevated. Place your arms straight out, tight your abs and hold your body in a plank position. While maintaining a straight body, lower yourself down until your chest is an inch above the floor and elbows pullingback roughly at 45 degrees. Now push your torso away fom ground until your arms are straight. Repeat this.

Start by lying on your back. Keep your arms on the side and lift your legs. Let the legs be as straight as possible. Now, quickly raise your right leg and at the same time, lower your left leg. Then do the same on the other leg. Repeat it.
Keep up the good work! For tips on maintaining a healthy weight, check out the food and diet and fitness sections.
When you monitor your heart rate during physical exercise and stay within your target heart rate zone, you reap the most health benefits and lessen your risk of injury.
Pulse rate to target during aerobic exercise based on age
Initially, lie down on your back and bend your legs. Take the support of your hands on the side, lift your head and touch your heels alternatively with your hands.
Lie down on ground and lift your both legs upwards(ninety degree from ground).Now lift your butt up till you feel contraction in your abs then slowly come back in same position.
Weight that is believed to be maximally healthful for a person
The three most popular formulas for calculating ideal weight are the Devine, Robinson and Miller formulas.\n\nWeight in lbs (kg)
Lie down on your back, by stretching both your arms. Now, twist both your knees together to the left. Be in this position.
Lie down on your back, by stretching both your arms. Now, twist both your knees together to the right. Be in this position.
You may not give blood if:

â£ You have had a serious illness or major surgery in the past or are currently on medication. The reason you are taking medication may prevent you from giving blood.

â£ You have had complicated dental work. Simple fillings as OK after 24 hours; simple extractions are OK after 7 days.

â£ You have been in contact with an infectious disease or have been given certain immunisation in the last 4 weeks.

â£ You are presently on a hospital waiting list or undergoing medical tests.

â£ You have got or had any heart conditions.

â£ You do not weigh over 7stone 12lbs (50kgs). Please note, if you are female and aged between 17 and 19 years, weigh less than 10stone 3lbs (65kgs) and are less than 5â6â (168cm) in height, we need to confirm your estimated blood volume is over 3500ml.

First lie down on the floor, face down with your feet close together. Place your hands closer than shoulder width for a close hand position, tight your abs and hold your body in a plank position. While maintaining a straight body, lower yourself down until your chest is an inch above the floor and elbows pullingback roughly at 45 degrees. Now push your torso away fom ground until your arms are straight. Repeat this.
Lie down on your back and put your legs ninety degree to the ground and bend the knee.Now push your back upwards and then come to same position.
Number of breaths you have taken
Its Time to your Exercise Time..
The best way to lose weight if you\'re obese is through a combination of diet and exercise, and, in some cases, medicines. See a doctor for help and advice.

Lie down on your back. Put your legs right side with bend knees. Put your left hand behind your head for support and right hand straight in legs direction. Now lift your back and legs at the same time. and return to same position.

Lie down on your back. Put your legs left side with bend knees. Put your right hand behind your head for support and left hand straight in legs direction. Now lift your back and legs at the same time. and return to same position.
Lie down on your back and make your hands relax on ground. Both legs towards sky now take down one leg down slightly up the ground and do the same with another leg.

The best way to lose weight if you\'re overweight is through a combination of diet and exercise. The BMI calculator will give you a personal calorie allowance to help you achieve a healthy weight safely.
The purpose of this cycle is to prepare the body for pregnancy, and if this does not occur then bleeding occurs (the period), and your cycle starts over again.

First lie down on the floor, face down with your feet close together. Place your arms straight out, shoulder width apart. Now lift up your hips so that your body forms an upside down V. Your legs and arms should stay as straight as possible. Bend your elbows, until your both arms form a 90 degree angle, and bring your head close to the ground. Now slowly push yourself back up until your arms are straight. Repeat this.
Be on your toes and forearms with your body straight. Stay in this position for as long as possible.
Calculates the pregnancy due date of your baby

â£ You should not give blood if you are pregnant or you are a woman who has had a baby in the last 6 months.

â£ You can donate if you are breast feeding.

â£ If you have had a miscarriage or termination before 12 weeks it may be possible for you to donate.
Would you like to quit workout?
Lie down on your back and bend your knees. Now, bring your knees towards your head, by keeping your hands on your head.
Sit on the ground. Put legs straight on the ground and hands back with bend elbow for support. Now lift both legs and rotate them in clockwise direction.
Sit on the ground. Put legs straight on the ground and hands back with bend elbow for support. Now lift both legs and rotate them in counterclockwise direction.
You should never give blood if:
You should not give blood for 12 months after sex with:

â£ A man who has sex with another man (if youâre a female).

â£ A commercial sex worker.

â£ Anyone who has ever injected themselves with drugs.

â£ Anyone with haemophilia or a related blood clotting disorder who has received clotting factor concentrates.

â£ Anyone of any race, who has been sexually active in parts of the world where AIDS/HIV is very common. This includes countries in Africa.

â£ You have ever had syphilis, HTLV (Human T Cell lymphotropic Virus), HIV or Hepatitis C.

â£ You are a man who has had anal or oral sex with another man with or without a condom.

â£ Youâve ever worked as a commercial sex worker.

â£ Youâve ever injected yourself with drugs â even once.
You should not give blood if:

â£ You are a male donor with less than 12 weeks interval between donations.

â£ You are a female donor with less than 16 weeks interval between donations.

â£ You have a sore throat, chesty cough or active cold sore. You can donate once you are feeling well (end of a cold is OK) and the cold sore is dry and healing.

â£ You are currently taking antibiotics or you have just finished a course within the last 7 days or have had an infection in the last 2 weeks.

â£ You have had hepatitis or jaundice in the last 12 months.

â£ You have had a tattoo, semi-permanent make up or any cosmetic treatments that involves skin piercing in the last 12 months.

â£ You have had acupuncture in the last 12 months, unless this was done within the NHS or by a qualified Healthcare Professional registered with a statutory body.

â£ A member of your family (parent, brother, sister or child) has suffered with CJD (Creutzfeld-Jakob Disease).

â£ You have ever received human pituitary extract (which was used in some growth hormone or fertility treatments before 1985)

â£ You have received blood or think you may have received blood during the course of any medical treatment or procedure anywhere in the world since 1 January 1980.

Lie down on ground on your left side.Put your one hand below your head and second on your waist for support. Now pull your body up till you feel contraction and then slowly come back in same position.

Lie down on ground on your right side.Put your one hand below your head and second on your waist for support. Now pull your body up till you feel contraction and then slowly come back in same position.
Start by lying on your side, with the head, resting on the right arm. Now, lift your left leg and then come back to the initial position. Repeat it.
Start by lying on your side, with the head, resting on the left arm. Now, lift your right leg and then come back to the initial position. Repeat it.
Lie down on ground on your left side. Now lift up your body on support of your elbow, forearm and your heels and form a straight line.Be in the same position for a given time.
Lie down on ground on your right side. Now lift up your body on support of your elbow, forearm and your heels and form a straight line.Be in the same position for a given time.

First lie down on the floor, face down with your feet close together.Spread your feet wider than shoulder width apart. Place left hand behind your thigh.Place your right hand straight out, shoulder width apart, tight your abs and hold your body in a plank position. While maintaining a straight body, lower yourself slowly down until your chest is an inch above the floor and elbows pullingback roughly at 45 degrees. Now push your torso away fom ground until your arms are straight. Repeat this.

First lie down on the floor, face down with your feet close together.Spread your feet wider than shoulder width apart. Place right hand behind your thigh.Place your left hand straight out, shoulder width apart, tight your abs and hold your body in a plank position. While maintaining a straight body, lower yourself slowly down until your chest is an inch above the floor and elbows pullingback roughly at 45 degrees. Now push your torso away fom ground until your arms are straight. Repeat this.

First lie down on the floor, lift your left leg off the ground, face down with your feet close together. Place your arms straight out, shoulder width apart, tight your abs and hold your body in a plank position. While maintaining a straight body, lower yourself down until your chest is an inch above the floor and elbows pullingback roughly at 45 degrees. Now push your torso away fom ground until your arms are straight and then lower your left leg to the ground. Repeat this.

First lie down on the floor, lift your right leg off the ground, face down with your feet close together. Place your arms straight out, shoulder width apart, tight your abs and hold your body in a plank position. While maintaining a straight body, lower yourself down until your chest is an inch above the floor and elbows pullingback roughly at 45 degrees. Now push your torso away fom ground until your arms are straight and then lower your right leg to the ground. Repeat this.
Lie on your back and your knees slightly bent. Now lift up your back and tilt towards right and return to your position.Now do the same in opposite direction.

First lie down on the floor, face down with your feet close together. Place your arms straight out, shoulder width apart, tight your abs and hold your body in a plank position. While maintaining a straight body, lower yourself down until your chest is an inch above the floor and elbows pullingback roughly at 45 degrees. As you lower down, bring your right leg up and to the side. Touch the knee to the elbow. Now push your torso away fom ground, return the leg to its original position and let your arms be straight. Repeat the same with other leg

First lie down on the floor, face down with your feet close together. Place your arms straight out, shoulder width apart, tight your abs and hold your body in a plank position. While maintaining a straight body, lower yourself down until your chest is an inch above the floor and elbows pullingback roughly at 45 degrees. Now push your torso away fom ground until your arms are straight. Repeat this.
This will be the number of calories you can eat everyday and maintain current weight.
In order to lose weight, you will need to take in fewer calories or have to burn more calories than this result.
To gain weight, you will need to take in more calories than this result.
Being underweight could be a sign you\'re not eating enough or you may be ill. If you\'re underweight, a doctor can help.

Sit on your butt, your legs and back are lift upwards. Now lift your back and bring your knees towards chest.Then return to same position.

Sit on the floor on your butt. Now lift your back at 45 degree angle and lift your leg 90 degree to the ground , bend your knees and stretch your hands towards kness. Hold this position for given time.

Lie down on ground and put your hands behind. Now pull your legs,hands and back like that you should touch your toes with your hands and in this hands and legs should straight as much as possible then slowly come back in same position.
This chart shows the requirement of water in a day by a person as per his/her weight.\n\nMultiply your weight in kg by 2.2 to get your weight in lbs using the calculator above.
How much water should you drink each day?

First lie down on the floor, hands wide apart, face down with your feet close together. Place your arms straight out, shoulder width apart, tight your abs and hold your body in a plank position. While maintaining a straight body, lower yourself down until your chest is an inch above the floor and elbows pullingback roughly at 45 degrees. Now push your torso away fom ground until your arms are straight. Repeat this.

First lie down on the floor, face down with your feet close together. Place your arms straight out, shoulder width apart, tight your abs and hold your body in a plank position. While maintaining a straight body, lower yourself down until your chest is an inch above the floor and elbows pullingback roughly at 45 degrees. Now push your torso away fom ground until your arms are straight. Now jump your feet back together as you straighten your arms to return to start. Repeat this.
Lying down on floor.Spread your legs and hands.Now push your back upwards with folding your legs and hands together.

Physical fitness is a state of health and well-being and, more specifically, the ability to perform aspects of sports, occupations and daily activities.
whereas nutrition is the process of utilizing food for growth, metabolism and repair of tissues.
Explore a variety of free fitness and health calculators including a BMI calculator
